Room.Name: Avernus
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Avernus, which is the first plane of the Nine Hells.
Room.LongDescription: Avernus is the top layer of the Nine Hells, the plane of evil where evil manifests itself. This plane is a rocky wasteland, guarded by hideous demons, ferocious dragons and unnatural devils. Avernus is the most heavily guarded level of the Nine Hells, and you're likely to meet much resistance in this deadly realm. The gateway to Dis, the second plane of the Nine Hells is guarded by Tiamat himself.
